## Get Data

```{r}
# Load buildings previously saved from OSM

bruBuildings <- readRDS(here::here("2021/data/rawData/bruBuildings.rds")) %>% 
  select(osm_id, 
         geometry)
```

```{r}
# Load highways previously saved from OSM

bruHighways <- readRDS(here::here("2021/data/rawData/bruHighways.rds")) %>% 
  select(osm_id, 
         highway,
         geometry)
```

## Wrangle Data

```{r}
# Calculate orientations

bruOrientations <- bruHighways %>%
  as_Spatial() %>% 
  angle_diff(angle = 0,
             bidirectional = F,
             absolute = F)

# Join to the original dataframe

bruHighways$orientation <- bruOrientations

# Round the values off

glimpse(bruHighways)

bruHighways <- bruHighways %>% 
  st_as_sf() %>% 
  st_transform(3857) %>% 
  select(osm_id,
         highway,
         orientation,
         geometry) %>% 
  mutate(orientation = round(orientation, digits = 0))
```

```{r}
# Fix orientations so that the values go between 0 and 360

bruHighways %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = orientation)) +
  geom_histogram()

bruHighways$orientation[bruHighways$orientation < 0] <- bruHighways$orientation[bruHighways$orientation < 0] + 360

bruHighways <- bruHighways %>%
  mutate(
    group = case_when(
      orientation < 22.5 ~ "A",
      orientation > 22.5 &
        orientation < 67.5 ~ "B",
      orientation > 67.5 &
        orientation < 112.5 ~ "C",
      orientation > 112.5 &
        orientation < 157.5 ~ "D",
      orientation > 157.5 &
        orientation < 202.5 ~ "E",
      orientation > 202.5 &
        orientation < 247.5 ~ "F",
      orientation > 247.5 &
        orientation < 292.5 ~ "G",
      orientation > 292.5 &
        orientation < 337.5 ~ "H",
      orientation > 337.5 ~ "A"
    )
  )

```

```{r}
# Calculate building orientations

bruBldgOrientations <- bruBuildings %>% 
  fs_mbr()
```

```{r}
# Add orientations back to the dataframe

bruBuildings$angle <- bruBldgOrientations

```

```{r}
# Group buildings by orientation

bruBuildings <- bruBuildings %>%
  mutate(
    group = case_when(
      angle < 22.5 ~ "A",
      angle > 22.5 &
        angle < 67.5 ~ "B",
      angle > 67.5 &
        angle < 112.5 ~ "C",
      angle > 112.5 &
        angle < 157.5 ~ "D",
      angle > 157.5 &
        angle < 202.5 ~ "E",
      angle > 202.5 &
        angle < 247.5 ~ "F",
      angle > 247.5 &
        angle < 292.5 ~ "G",
      angle > 292.5 &
        angle < 337.5 ~ "H",
      angle > 337.5 ~ "A"
    )
  ) %>% 
  st_transform(3857)

```

```{r}
# Now, I want a minimum bounding box

bruBound <- bruHighways %>% 
  st_bbox() %>% 
  st_as_sfc()

mapBound <- bruBound %>% 
  st_centroid() %>% 
  st_buffer(7000)

mapLimit <- bruBound %>% 
  st_centroid() %>% 
  st_buffer(7500)
```

```{r}
# Filter highways to the map bounds

bruHighways <- bruHighways %>% 
  st_intersection(mapBound)

# Filter buildings to the map bounds

bruBuildings <- bruBuildings %>% 
  st_intersection(mapBound)

```

## Build Map

```{r}
# Build the base layer

vizBase <-  tm_shape(mapLimit) +
  tm_fill(col = "#f1eee9") +
  tm_shape(mapBound) +
  tm_fill(col = "#f1eee9") +
  tm_layout(bg.color = "#f1eee9",
            frame = F,
            frame.lwd = NA,
            attr.outside = F,
            outer.margins = 0,
            asp = 0,
            scale = 0.8,
            main.title = "Brussels Capital Region",
            main.title.color = "#000000",
            main.title.size = 1.75,
            main.title.fontfamily = "Arial Narrow",
            main.title.fontface = 2,
            main.title.position = "center",
            title = "Placeholder Text",
            title.color = "#f1eee9",
            title.size = 1,
            title.position = c("center", "TOP"),
            title.fontface = 2,
            legend.position = c("right", "center")) + 
  tm_credits("#30DayMapChallenge | Day 09 | Anirudh Govind | Nov 2021\nMap data Â© OpenStreetMap contributors and available from https://www.openstreetmap.org",
             col = "#000000",
             size = 0.75,
             position = c("left", "bottom"),
             fontfamily = "Arial Narrow")
```

```{r}
# Streets layer

vizStr <- tm_shape(bruHighways) +
  tm_lines(col = "orientationGroup",
           palette = "Greys",
           lwd = 0.5,
           legend.col.show = F,
           legend.lwd.show = F)
```

```{r}
# Fountains

vizBuildings <- tm_shape(bruBuildings) +
  tm_fill(col = "group",
          palette = "Greys",
          legend.show = F)

```

```{r}
# Combine layers

viz <- vizBase +
  vizStr +
  vizBuildings

```

## Export

```{r}
# Export the map as an image to upload onto twitter

tmap_save(tm = viz,
          filename = here::here("2021/exports/Day9.png"),
          dpi = 450,
          width = 200,
          height = 200,

```
